TopicTitle: [AAR] Vengeance: A Journey To Space -- WARNING: IMAGE HEAVY

Articles.Content:
Vengeance: A Journey To Space

This is the continuation of Development and Construction, With even more excitement, more exploration, and more pics!

Kerbals reached space, got to the mun, and started to establish a foothold before getting kicked off the mun by their own children.

The largest station placed in the sky has been destroyed, and the only warship has been destroyed.

Now the only thing Kerbal-kind has to focus on, is their Vengeance.

Previous story: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/35928-AAR-Construction-A-Journey-to-Space-WARNING-IMAGE-HEAVY

First story: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/28970-AAR-Development-A-Journey-to-space

WARNING: THIS STORY WILL BE PICTURE HEAVY, AND IT WILL BE CONTINUING FROM PREVIOUS STORIES- READ THOSE STORIES FIRST TO MAKE SENSE OF THIS ONE.

This story will be ideally updated 1x a week, possibly 2x a week if I get some extra free time.

Edited August 3, 2013 by Mekan1k
very cool! looking foreward to it!
excited for it to be continued.
Found the new story. Can't wait to see what happens next.
Yay! New story. 50 Kerbits on Jeb riding the bomb out on the swarm.

A kerbit is a male Kerbal, where a kerbyte is a female kerbal....

So, what, you are betting 50 lives on it?

No, 50 currency. Kredits or something like that.

...But still, it would be awesome ...

...But still, it would be awesome ...

Yes. Yes it would.

Oh, and current mods list:

If it is within these parameters (save for fasa- I only have a couple of their parts, as I love their micro-lander design), a ship should be do-able.

Well, if you want to go full on into war, you could draw some inspiration from Kerbals At War 2. The crafts there are pretty damn sweet.

Other than that, I can imagine some gravioli probes being sent near the SWARM without being destroyed by making it look like the impacted onto a planet/moon.Even AI can be tricked surely.

That reminds me. Are there gonna be weapons other than lasers?

I hope so. If there is atmospheric conflict, (which I hope there will be), Verolan Space & Aeronautics Ltd. will probably hire a few mercenary fighter aces to help the military. One of which would be flying this

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/43624-F-104-Starfighter-v2-0-pre-release

and have this as his emblem

Ace Combat fans, rejoice!

Weapons:

-Lazor-based missiles

-Pirated-Weaponry 'Splosives

-Kinetic-kill-weapons (orbital-drop weapons and such)

Oh, and possibly space-time distrortion-engines. Framshift drives are tricky to work....
What mod does the engine from the Trawler come from?
z pinch engine, but hasn't been updated for 20 or 21, so manual config edits will be needed.
Could someone pass me those .cfg edits? It seems they don't work well in .21 at all, even in the Legacy folders. (ie. the old Parts folder and such)

Could someone pass me those .cfg edits? It seems they don't work well in .21 at all, even in the Legacy folders. (ie. the old Parts folder and such)

Here you go.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/2kdi6pl07vsvmy8/cfg%20edits%20for%20z%20pinch%20engines.zip
Thanks man.
no problem, always a pleasure to help others in need.

no problem, always a pleasure to help others in need.

I snagged that as well. Thank you very much!

Also: I will be implementing a mass relay.

Why?

If you have a good design, (unmodded) Please post a pic and I will ping you if I decide to use it.

(Be sure to include private corp name or if you want it to be part of one of the other corps)

That's all.

Kerbalic Systems Ltd. presents their mass relay.

It's not the prettiest ship in the collection, but the company values functionality over looks.

Edited August 7, 2013 by Tyber
This is gonna be hilarious
Heck yeah! Also, I can't get the Fusion Engines to produce thrust.

I have an exam at 8 AM on the 10th, so I will be uploading the chapter after I finish that exam. Wish me luck!

Sorry for the delay.

I am sorry for the delay, but I can give you a teaser pic (I am going to bed now, I need to wake up in 6 hours so that I can be ready for the test.)

***

Bill: How will we be fighting self reproducing machines?

Jeb: With self-reproducing missiles!

Bill: ... What?

Mek/Al1c3: There is no way this can go wrong. Ever.

Bill: Are you being sarcastic?

Mek/Al1c3: YES.

Jeb: Was the yes sarcastic, the sentence sarcastic, or....

Mek/Al1c3: YES.
